Package org.opends.guitools.uninstaller

Class UninstallerArgumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.ArgumentParser
      • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.SubCommandArgumentParser
        • org.opends.server.admin.client.cli.SecureConnectionCliParser
          • org.opends.guitools.uninstaller.UninstallerArgumentParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolRefDocContainer
    public class UninstallerArgumentParser
extends SecureConnectionCliParser
    Class used to parse and populate the arguments of the Uninstaller.

      • UninstallerArgumentParser

        public UninstallerArgumentParser​(String mainClassName,
                                 org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage toolDescription,
                                 boolean longArgumentsCaseSensitive)
        Creates a new instance of this argument parser with no arguments.
        Parameters:
        mainClassName - The fully-qualified name of the Java class that should be invoked to launch the program with which this argument parser is associated.
        toolDescription - A human-readable description for the tool, which will be included when displaying usage information.
        longArgumentsCaseSensitive - Indicates whether subcommand and long argument names should be treated in a case-sensitive manner.

      • isInteractive

        public boolean isInteractive()
        Tells whether the user specified to have an interactive uninstall or not. This method must be called after calling parseArguments.
        Returns:
        true if the user specified to have an interactive uninstall and false otherwise.
